summary: Previous issues have been addressed. The unused enumerate variable was fixed, and revision-response.json was removed. The developer's justification for the markdown detection heuristic is reasonable - the existing safeguards (2+ pattern requirement and acceptable HTML structure check) provide adequate protection. Code is functional and ready to merge.

issues.description: The .code-review-output.json file was re-added in a subsequent commit after being deleted
issues.suggestion: Consider adding this file to .gitignore or removing it before merge

positives: Previous feedback was addressed properly - unused variable fix and temporary file removal
Developer provided thoughtful justification for the WONT_DO decision on content transformation
The markdown detection heuristic has reasonable safeguards against false positives
Clean implementation following existing codebase patterns
Good use of the markdown library with appropriate extensions
